name: Ancestral Recall
text: Target player draws three cards.

name: Time Walk
text: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Timetwister
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. (Then put Timetwister into its owner's graveyard.)

name: Black Lotus
text: {T}, Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

name: Mox Emerald
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

name: Mox Jet
text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

name: Mox Pearl
text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

name: Mox Ruby
text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

name: Mox Sapphire
text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

name: Afterlife
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Akroma's Blessing
text: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.\nCycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The clerics saw her as a divine gift. She saw them only as allies in her war against Phage.

name: Armageddon
text: Destroy all lands.
flavor: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

name: Astral Slide
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "The hum of the universe is never off-key."\n—Mystic elder

name: Balance
text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

name: Battle Screech
text: Put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nFlashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Benalish Trapper
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

name: Benevolent Bodyguard
text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

name: Breath of Life
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Nothing can stop the power of life—not even death."\n—Onean cleric

name: Brilliant Halo
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+2.\nWhen Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

name: Council's Judgment
text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
flavor: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

name: Crescendo of War
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a strife counter on Crescendo of War.\nAttacking creatures get +1/+0 for each strife counter on Crescendo of War.\nBlocking creatures you control get +1/+0 for each strife counter on Crescendo of War.

name: Decree of Justice
text: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nCycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Deftblade Elite
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)\n{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

name: Devout Witness
text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.

name: Empyrial Armor
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
flavor: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire."\n—"Hymn of Angelfire"

name: Eternal Dragon
text: Flying\n{3}{W}{W}: Return Eternal Dragon from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.\nPlainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Exile
text: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

name: Gilded Light
text: You gain shroud until end of turn. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "Whoever survives the first blow lives to land the second."

name: Gustcloak Harrier
text: Flying\nWhenever Gustcloak Harrier becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.
flavor: Banking steeply, the aven streaked toward the ground—and vanished.

name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
text: Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.\n{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

name: Karmic Guide
text: Flying, protection from black\nEcho {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "Such a lord as this—all virtues' height—\nHad never been, nor ever was again."

name: Mistmoon Griffin
text: Flying\nWhen Mistmoon Griffin dies, exile Mistmoon Griffin, then return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Mystic Zealot
text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Zealot gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor: Nomad youths aspire to one of two roles in the tribe: priest or warrior. Their secret dream is to become both.

name: Noble Templar
text: Vigilance\nPlainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Parallax Wave
text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Exile target creature.\nWhen Parallax Wave leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Wave.

name: Phantom Nomad
text: Phantom Nomad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\nIf damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.

name: Pianna, Nomad Captain
text: Whenever Pianna, Nomad Captain attacks, attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Some find inspiration in their swords. Others find it in their leaders.

name: Radiant, Archangel
text: Flying, vigilance\nRadiant, Archangel gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield.

name: Radiant's Judgment
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Renewed Faith
text: You gain 6 life.\nCycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.

name: Seal of Cleansing
text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."\n—Seal inscription

name: Shelter
text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.

name: Sidar Jabari
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\nWhenever Sidar Jabari attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor: "Prophecy is whatever one makes of it, but destiny cannot be changed."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Soltari Emissary
text: {W}: Soltari Emissary gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: Alone at the portal, Ertai began his meditation. He realized immediately that he was not alone.

name: Soltari Trooper
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Dauthi blood is soltari wine."\n—Soltari Tales of Life

name: Spirit Cairn
text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor: It marks the border between here and hereafter.

name: Spirit Mirror
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Reflection tokens on the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Reflection creature token onto the battlefield.\n{0}: Destroy target Reflection.

name: Stoic Champion
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: His outer calm belies his inner fury.

name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

name: Teroh's Faithful
text: When Teroh's Faithful enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor: The light of reason follows them even into battle.

name: Winds of Rath
text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: "There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Zhalfirin Crusader
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zhalfirin Crusader this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
flavor: "War is the crucible of leadership."\n—Rashida Scalebane

name: Academy Elite
text: Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.\n{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Aquamoeba
text: Discard a card: Switch Aquamoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor: Some tides need no moon.

name: Brain Freeze
text: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Brainstorm
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

name: Choking Tethers
text: Tap up to four target creatures.\nCycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

name: Circular Logic
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.\nMadness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Cloud Djinn
text: Flying\nCloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: As elusive as the footprint of a djinn\n—Suq'Ata expression

name: Cloud of Faeries
text: Flying\nWhen Cloud of Faeries enters the battlefield, untap up to two lands.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Control Magic
text: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.
flavor: "Do as I think, not as I do."\n—Jace Beleren

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.
flavor: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

name: Deep Analysis
text: Target player draws two cards.\nFlashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

name: Ephemeron
text: Flying\nDiscard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.
flavor: From nothing came teeth.

name: Fact or Fiction
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

name: Flusterstorm
text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Force of Will
text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.\nCounter target spell.

name: Frantic Search
text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
flavor: Motivation was high in the academy once students realized flunking their exams could kill them.

name: Future Sight
text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.\nYou may play the top card of your library.

name: Gush
text: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Gush's mana cost.\nDraw two cards.
flavor: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

name: High Tide
text: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds {U} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
flavor: "There's nothing like the high seas to clear your head or escape pursuers."

name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

name: Keeneye Aven
text: Flying\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "I have no need of a map. The continent itself guides my way."

name: Killer Whale
text: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

name: Krovikan Sorcerer
text: {T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card.\n{T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
flavor: "These sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."\n—Zur the Enchanter

name: Mana Drain
text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

name: Man-o'-War
text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."\n—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Mind's Desire
text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Morphling
text:
{U}: Untap Morphling.
{U}: Morphling gains flying until end of turn.
{U}: Morphling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Morphling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Morphling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Muzzio, Visionary Architect
text: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Obsessive Search
text: Draw a card.\nMadness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: The question strained his sanity. The answer snapped it in half.

name: Ophidian
text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Owl Familiar
text: Flying\nWhen Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Palinchron
text: Flying\nWhen Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands.\n{2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

name: Plea for Power
text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for time or knowledge. If time gets more votes, take an extra turn after this one. If knowledge gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw three cards.

name: Power Sink
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

name: Repel
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor: "I have a hunch we'll be seeing that one again soon."\n—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Rescind
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Scrivener
text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: A good memory is no match for a good scribe.

name: Sea Drake
text: Flying\nWhen Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

name: Serendib Efreet
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

name: Skywing Aven
text: Flying\nDiscard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

name: Stroke of Genius
text: Target player draws X cards.
flavor: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

name: Temporal Fissure
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Thalakos Drifters
text: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.

name: Tradewind Rider
text: Flying\n{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: It is said that the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.

name: Turnabout
text: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

name: Upheaval
text: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor: The calm comes after the storm.

name: Volrath's Shapeshifter
text: As long as the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter has the full text of that card and has the text "{2}: Discard a card." (Volrath's Shapeshifter has that card's name, mana cost, color, types, abilities, power, and toughness.)\n{2}: Discard a card.

name: Waterfront Bouncer
text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

name: Addle
text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: "I'll wring out your tiny mind like a sponge."\n—Urborg witch

name: Animate Dead
text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard\nWhen Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.\nEnchanted creature gets -1/-0.

name: Baleful Force
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: "As with any malevolent being, the trick is knowing how long you can afford to keep it in your service."\n—Liliana Vess

name: Cabal Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.\nThreshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: "Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."\n—Cabal Patriarch

name: Carnophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor: Eating is all it knows.

name: Chainer's Edict
text: Target player sacrifices a creature.\nFlashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Choking Sands
text: Destroy target non-Swamp land. If that land was nonbasic, Choking Sands deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
flavor: "The people wiped the sand from their eyes and cursed—and left the barren land to the hyenas and vipers."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Crovax the Cursed
text: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax.\n{B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

name: Cruel Bargain
text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Dark Hatchling
text: Flying\nWhen Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
flavor: "Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due."\n—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Dauthi Mercenary
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\n{1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The dauthi believe they dignify murder by paying for it."\n—Lyna, soltari emissary

name: Death's-Head Buzzard
text: Flying\nWhen Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

name: Demonic Tutor
text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Drakestown Forgotten
text: Drakestown Forgotten enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.\n{2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Drakestown Forgotten: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Expunge
text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Fallen Askari
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\nFallen Askari can't block.
flavor: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

name: Famine
text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: "Better to starve to death than be bored to death."\n—Liliana Vess

name: Fledgling Djinn
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: "The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know."\n—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Hymn to Tourach
text: Target player discards two cards at random.
flavor: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.

name: Ichorid
text: Haste\nAt the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

name: Kezzerdrix
text: First strike\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

name: Laquatus's Champion
text: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life.\nWhen Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life.\n{B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.
flavor: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

name: Living Death
text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

name: Lurking Evil
text: Pay half your life, rounded up: Lurking Evil becomes a 4/4 Horror creature with flying.
flavor: "Ash is our air, darkness our flesh."\n—Phyrexian Scriptures

name: Mesmeric Fiend
text: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.\nWhen Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

name: Nature's Ruin
text: Destroy all green creatures.
flavor: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

name: Necropotence
text: Skip your draw step.\nWhenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.\nPay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

name: Nightscape Familiar
text: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\n{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.
flavor: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

name: Paralyze
text:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.

name: Phyrexian Defiler
text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: "The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."\n—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Predatory Nightstalker
text: When Predatory Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature.

name: Putrid Imp
text: Discard a card: Putrid Imp gains flying until end of turn.\nThreshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Putrid Imp gets +1/+1 and can't block.

name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: "You will learn to earn death."\n—Volrath

name: Recurring Nightmare
text: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare."\n—Crovax

name: Reign of the Pit
text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Put an X/X black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.

name: Sarcomancy
text: When Sarcomancy enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Zombies on the battlefield, Sarcomancy deals 1 damage to you.

name: Skirge Familiar
text: Flying\nDiscard a card: Add {B} to your mana pool.
flavor: The first Yawgmoth priest to harness their power was rewarded with several unique mutilations.

name: Spinal Graft
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.\nWhen enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "This one has not screamed enough to show effective implantation. Kill it."\n—Volrath

name: Tendrils of Agony
text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Tyrant's Choice
text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.

name: Urborg Uprising
text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.\nDraw a card.
flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

name: Vampiric Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
flavor: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets."\n—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Visara the Dreadful
text: Flying\n{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

name: Yawgmoth's Bargain
text: Skip your draw step.\nPay 1 life: Draw a card.
flavor: He craves only one commodity.

name: Yawgmoth's Will
text: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard.\nIf a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

name: Aftershock
text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
flavor: "Every act of destruction has a repercussion."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Beetleback Chief
text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

name: Burning of Xinye
text: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands he or she controls. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

name: Burning Wish
text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.
flavor: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

name: Chain Lightning
text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Chaos Warp
text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into his or her library, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a permanent card, he or she puts it onto the battlefield.

name: Chartooth Cougar
text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nMountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Clickslither
text: Haste\nSacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

name: Crater Hellion
text: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

name: Falter
text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor: Like a sleeping dragon, Shiv stirs and groans at times.

name: Fireblast
text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.\nFireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Flametongue Kavu
text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."\n—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

name: Flowstone Hellion
text: Haste\n{0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Volrath leaves no stone untrained.

name: Gamble
text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.
flavor: When you've got nothing, you might as well trade it for something else.

name: Giant Strength
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor: "Crovax seems filled only with shadows," thought Orim. "Where does his strength come from?"

name: Goblin Commando
text: When Goblin Commando enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor: With a commando around, somebody's gonna get hurt.

name: Goblin General
text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

name: Goblin Goon
text: Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.\nGoblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
flavor: Giant-sized body. Goblin-sized brain.

name: Goblin Lackey
text: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.

name: Goblin Matron
text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Goblin Patrol
text: Echo {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor: "Take the sharp metal stick and make a lotta holes."\n—Jula, goblin raider

name: Goblin Piledriver
text: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.)\nWhenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

name: Goblin Ringleader
text: Haste\nWhen Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Goblin Settler
text: When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
flavor: Be it ever so crumbled, there's no place like home.

name: Goblin Warchief
text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nGoblin creatures you control have haste.
flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

name: Hulking Goblin
text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
flavor: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

name: Kaervek's Torch
text: As long as Kaervek's Torch is on the stack, spells that target it cost {2} more to cast.\nKaervek's Torch deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor: The pulsing heat of the midday Sun burns in the Lion's eye.\n—Stone inscription, source unknown

name: Kindle
text: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

name: Lightning Dragon
text: Flying\nEcho {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\n{R}: Lightning Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Lightning Rift
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, Lightning Rift deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Options will cost you, but a lack of them will cost you even more.

name: Orcish Lumberjack
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "Wood is wasted in the dirt."\n—Orcish proverb

name: Pillaging Horde
text: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Reckless Charge
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.\nFlashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Rites of Initiation
text: Discard any number of cards at random. Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

name: Rorix Bladewing
text: Flying, haste
flavor: In the smoldering ashes of Shiv, a few dragons strive to rebuild their native land. The rest seek any opportunity to restore the broken pride of their race.

name: Scourge of the Throne
text: Flying\nDethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)\nWhenever Scourge of the Throne attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "I order you to volunteer."

name: Skirk Prospector
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
flavor: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."\n—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Solar Blast
text: Solar Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\nCycling {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Solar Blast, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Spark Spray
text: Spark Spray deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nCycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: It's the only kind of shower goblins will tolerate.

name: Starstorm
text: Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.\nCycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.

name: Sulfuric Vortex
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player.\nIf a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

name: Wall of Diffusion
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.
flavor: "The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within."\n—Lyna, soltari emissary

name: Wheel of Fortune
text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

name: Worldgorger Dragon
text: Flying, trample\nWhen Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control.\nWhen Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

name: Armor of Thorns
text: You may cast Armor of Thorns as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.\nEnchant nonblack creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Arrogant Wurm
text: Trample\nMadness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite-size.

name: Basking Rootwalla
text: {1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.\nMadness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Berserk
text: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step.\nTarget creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

name: Blastoderm
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nFading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Brindle Shoat
text: When Brindle Shoat dies, put a 3/3 green Boar creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Hunters lure the stripling boar into the open, hoping to trap greater prey.

name: Channel
text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C} to your mana pool.

name: Claws of Wirewood
text: Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

name: Deranged Hermit
text: Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Deranged Hermit enters the battlefield, put four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nSquirrel creatures get +1/+1.

name: Desert Twister
text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor: Massive, mindless, and imbued with one terrible purpose.

name: Dreampod Druid
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if Dreampod Druid is enchanted, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Don't mistake my creations for mere vegetation. They are my children, loyal and fierce."

name: Elephant Guide
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Nature's strength outlives the strong.

name: Elvish Aberration
text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.\nForestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Erhnam Djinn
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: He provides a safe path to nowhere.

name: Eureka
text: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.

name: Fastbond
text: You may play any number of lands on each of your turns.\nWhenever you play a land, if it wasn't the first land you played this turn, Fastbond deals 1 damage to you.

name: Fyndhorn Elves
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "We could no more abandon the forest than the stars could abandon the night sky."

name: Gaea's Embrace
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.\n{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor: The forest rose to the battle, not to save the people, but to save itself.

name: Genesis
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."\n—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Giant Mantis
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "I hate insects of every sort. The only mercy is that they are generally small."\n—Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

name: Gigapede
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Gigapede is in your graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Gigapede to your hand.

name: Grizzly Fate
text: Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nThreshold — Put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.\nFlashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Hermit Druid
text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
flavor: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

name: Jungle Wurm
text: Whenever Jungle Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
flavor: Broad as a baobab—and about as smart.

name: Krosan Tusker
text: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Krosan Vorine
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)\nKrosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Nature's Lore
text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

name: Norwood Priestess
text: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Nostalgic Dreams
text: As an additional cost to cast Nostalgic Dreams, discard X cards.\nReturn X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.
flavor: Seton dreams of life renewed.

name: Oath of Druids
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

name: Penumbra Wurm
text: Trample\nWhen Penumbra Wurm dies, put a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

name: Provoke
text: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

name: Realm Seekers
text: Realm Seekers enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total number of cards in all players' hands.\n{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Realm Seekers: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Regrowth
text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Roar of the Wurm
text: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Forest you control.

name: Saproling Burst
text: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst."\nWhen Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
text: Trample\n{G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.
flavor: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

name: Simian Grunts
text: Flash\nEcho {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor: These monkeys mean business.

name: Sudden Strength
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
flavor: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Sylvan Library
text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

name: Symbiotic Wurm
text: When Symbiotic Wurm dies, put seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

name: Tangle
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.\nEach attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: Gaea battles rampant death with abundant life.

name: Tribute to the Wild
text: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind."\n—Modruni, maro-sorcerer

name: Wild Mongrel
text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: It teaches you to play dead.

name: Yavimaya Elder
text: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.\n{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

name: Æther Mutation
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Armadillo Cloak
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: "Don't laugh. It works."

name: Baleful Strix
text: Flying, deathtouch\nWhen Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.

name: Basandra, Battle Seraph
text: Flying\nPlayers can't cast spells during combat.\n{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
flavor: "Why listen to the mumblings of wizards when the lash speaks true?"

name: Blazing Specter
text: Flying, haste\nWhenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Brago, King Eternal
text: Flying\nWhenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
flavor: "My rule persists beyond death itself."

name: Dack Fayden
text: +1: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.\n−2: Gain control of target artifact.\n−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

name: Dack's Duplicate
text: You may have Dack's Duplicate enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it gains haste and dethrone. (Whenever it attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Death Grasp
text: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.
flavor: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

name: Deathreap Ritual
text: Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.
flavor: "All who set foot in Paliano are pawns in someone's play for power."\n—Marchesa, the Black Rose

name: Edric, Spymaster of Trest
text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.
flavor: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

name: Fires of Yavimaya
text: Creatures you control have haste.\nSacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

name: Goblin Trenches
text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
text: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

name: Magister of Worth
text: Flying\nWill of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

name: Marchesa, the Black Rose
text: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)\nOther creatures you control have dethrone.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Prophetic Bolt
text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Psychatog
text: Discard a card: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\nExile two cards from your graveyard: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Reviving Vapors
text: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

name: Selvala, Explorer Returned
text: Parley — {T}: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, add {G} to your mana pool and you gain 1 life. Then each player draws a card.
flavor: "The Lowlands refuse to suffer at the whims of the High City."

name: Shivan Wurm
text: Trample\nWhen Shivan Wurm enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Spiritmonger
text: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.\n{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.\n{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Ankh of Mishra
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.

name: Chimeric Idol
text: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

name: City in a Bottle
text: Whenever a nontoken permanent originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion other than City in a Bottle is on the battlefield, its controller sacrifices it.\nPlayers can't play cards originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion.

name: Coercive Portal
text: Will of the council — At the beginning of your upkeep, starting with you, each player votes for carnage or homage. If carnage gets more votes, sacrifice Coercive Portal and destroy all nonland permanents. If homage gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.

name: Cursed Scroll
text: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Flowstone Sculpture
text: {2}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Flowstone Sculpture or Flowstone Sculpture gains flying, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: The sculptor, weary of his work, created art that would finish itself.

name: Ivory Tower
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.
flavor: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.

name: Karn, Silver Golem
text: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn.\n{1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn.

name: Lion's Eye Diamond
text: Sacrifice Lion's Eye Diamond, Discard your hand: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.
flavor: Held in the lion's eye\n—Zhalfirin saying meaning "caught in the moment of crisis"

name: Mana Crypt
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.\n{T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

name: Mana Prism
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Mana Vault
text:
Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault.
At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

name: Masticore
